alfredsnippet.snippet:
"... just after he was awarded the Galactic Institute's Prize for Extreme Cleverness he got lynched by a rampaging mob of respectable physicists who had finally realized that the one thing they really couldn't stand was a smart-ass."

- Douglas Adams, The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, Chapter 10
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Galactic Institute's Prize for Extreme Cleverness
